Come on, come on, come on.
[player] Fuck!

translation.en: and a team that only lost two games last season

Modesto Junior College comes into Laney
and pulls off a 33 to 20 victory over the Laney Eagles.
We'll learn, we'll get better. That's it, we'll get better.
[commentator 2] You come into this as a defending national champion,
